rows.label: qst701102_msg0001
rows.name:
Hrm? Who're you?
I don't have any appointments today.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0002
rows.name:
Please do excuse us interrupting you
unannounced.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0003
rows.name:
The thing is, we've heard you were
making a ship, and...

rows.label: qst701102_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes! I'm right in the middle of doing
some review work. No sleep, no rest.
For Alst, for its people, for Iira!

rows.label: qst701102_msg0005
rows.name:
As you can see, I've not got enough
people or materials, so it's all down
to me working triple-time...

rows.label: qst701102_msg0006
rows.name:
...Uh... So... What was I supposed to
be doing just now...?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0007
rows.name: ...Are you quite all right?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0008
rows.name:
He must be going mad from sleep
deprivation. Here, why don't we help?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0009
rows.name: Are you serious? That'd be brilliant!

rows.label: qst701102_msg0010
rows.name:
In that case... Could you get me a pane
of glass and ten lengths of lumber, and
find us a skipper? That'd probably do...

rows.label: qst701102_msg0011
rows.name:
Oh! Divine Beast's foot, I completely forgot
about the paint delivery!!!

rows.label: qst701102_msg0012
rows.name:
Wait up, wait up, hold on!
We'll need more to go on!!!

rows.label: qst701102_msg0013
rows.name: ...Gone without a trace.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0014
rows.name:
Interesting lad, isn't he?
Wears his heart on his sleeve and acts
as quick as he thinks.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0015
rows.name:
Sure, he's a real peach. But you do
realize that we've got no idea about
what he actually needs from us, right?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0016
rows.name:
Might it be an idea to visit Arb-san
and hear some details from him?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0017
rows.name:
It would be a shame to waste precious
time seeking a helmsman with no
concrete clues to go on.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0018
rows.name:
You spoke well Wadatsumi. At times
like these it is good to rely on the
expertise of others.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0019
rows.name:
Having the master cover for the
incompetence of his apprentice?
Makes sense, let's do it.

rows.label: qst701102_msg0020
rows.name:
You've got a real talent for wording
things in the exact worst way possible,
you know that?

rows.label: qst701102_msg0021
rows.name:
I just wonder why he's building that
ship in such a hurry in the first place...
